unnormalised: Alright folks, buckle up! The Indian auto market is buzzing with new wheels!
normalised: Alright folks, buckle up! The Indian auto market is buzzing with new wheels!

unnormalised: First up, Mahindra just dropped the all-new Thar 5-Door, and boy, does it look rugged! Word on the street is, it can handle anything from the ghats of Maharashtra to the dunes of Rajasthan. Pre-bookings are already through the roof!
normalised: First up, Mahindra just dropped the all-new Thar five-Door, and boy, does it look rugged! Word on the street is, it can handle anything from the ghats of Maharashtra to the dunes of Rajasthan. Pre-bookings are already through the roof!

unnormalised: Then, Tata Motors teased a glimpse of their upcoming electric SUV, the Avinya. Sleek design, futuristic interiors – looks like they're aiming to steal Tesla's thunder. Dr. Iyer from IIT Madras seems pretty impressed with the tech too!
normalised: Then, Tata Motors teased a glimpse of their upcoming electric S U V, the Avinya. Sleek design, futuristic interiors – looks like they're aiming to steal Tesla's thunder. Doctor Iyer from I I T Madras seems pretty impressed with the tech too!

unnormalised: Maruti Suzuki isn't sleeping either. They're rumored to be launching a CNG version of the Brezza soon, aiming for that mileage-conscious Desi buyer. Expect competitive pricing, probably around Rs. 8 lakhs.
normalised: Maruti Suzuki isn't sleeping either. They're rumored to be launching a C N G version of the Brezza soon, aiming for that mileage-conscious Desi buyer. Expect competitive pricing, probably around rupee eight lakh.

unnormalised: And finally, a little birdie told us that Hero MotoCorp is revving up a new adventure bike, aiming for those long weekend rides to Leh-Ladakh. They’re also expanding their manufacturing facility by 50,000 sq ft.
normalised: And finally, a little birdie told us that Hero MotoCorp is revving up a new adventure bike, aiming for those long weekend rides to Leh-Ladakh. They’re also expanding their manufacturing facility by fifty thousand square feet.

unnormalised: So, keep your eyes peeled and your wallets ready – because the next few months are going to be HUGE in the Indian automotive scene.
normalised: So, keep your eyes peeled and your wallets ready – because the next few months are going to be HUGE in the Indian automotive scene.
